job.title: Scala Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Java (Functional Scala) Engineer</strong></p><p><strong>New York City, NY and San Francisco, CA</strong></p><p><strong>6+Months</strong></p><p><strong></strong></p><p><strong>Requirements</strong></p><p>Strong experience with functional programming languages: Scala, Clojure, Haskell, or Common Lisp</p><p>Experience with one or more functional libraries (or similar): ZIO, Cats, and/or Monix</p><p>Experience with cloud computing (AWS, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud)</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Day to day responsibilities</strong></p><p>This role will contribute to building a modern system of record platform for financial data, including software development, code reviews, design discussions, work planning and prioritization.&nbsp;The platform is written in functional Scala and extensively utilizes</p><p>the ZIO library.&nbsp;The role would also involve&nbsp;mentoring less-experienced team members in functional&nbsp;Scala and software development techniques and best practices.&nbsp;Business hour on-call support and troubleshooting are also part of the role.</p>
